'''Edna''' is a nun from the [[Church of Favonius]]. She makes an appearance in the event [[Unreconciled Stars]]. During this event, she can be found in [[Springvale]].

==Profile==
<!--detailed story/lore information goes here-->

===Appearance===
Edna has long brown hair and grey eyes, she wears a black and white nun uniform and a black and white wimple.
